name: Bulma ブルマ / Dragon Ball
description:
weight 0.6~0.7 is best. (This may vary depending on the checkpoint.)

I created this LoRA as requested.

Please read the description.

outfit1 (braided ponytail)
dragon ball, blmpony, aqua hair, hair ribbon, braided ponytail, pink shirt, belt, scarf, pink skirt, clothes writing, brown gloves, medium breasts

outfit2 (one side up)
dragon ball, blmsdup, bulma, aqua hair, one side up, pink dress, long sleeves, collarbone, medium breasts

outfit3 (bunny suit)
dragon ball, blmlong, aqua hair, blunt bangs, long hair, playboy bunny, rabbit ears, black pantyhose, red bowtie, wrist cuffs, black leotard, large breasts

outfit4 (hairband)
dragon ball, blmmid, aqua hair, medium hair, blunt bangs, red hairband, medium breasts, shirt, skirt

outfit5 (very short hair)
dragon ball, blmshort, aqua hair, very short hair, earrings, jewelry, red dress, medium breasts, yellow scarf, short dress, sleeveless

I uploaded a sample image of the outfit as a post.

Depending on which outfit you use, you may need to change the weight value.

And if you don't want Dragon Ball style, you can leave out the Dragon Ball prompts.
